title: Grave Magic Bounty
description: A Paranormal Women's Fiction with a bit of class, and a lot of sass for anyone who feels like age is just a number!  One day I’m married, living in Seattle, and magic isn’t real. The next, I’m divorced and living in the guest room of my ex’s hotter- than-sin cousin’s place in Savannah . . . and talking to an animated skeleton named Robert.  I have to admit, Robert isn’t my worst date.  At forty-one, I didn’t think I’d be starting over. But I’ll be damned if my ex thinks I’m down and out because he pulled a fast one on me. When a job comes my way that offers me a chance to use my childhood training in the shadow world, I take it—I need the money more than I care about my sanity.  It’s dangerous. I have to embrace the magic and dark of my past. And I need Advil to keep me going.  So those who’d hold me back better sit up and take notice, because a new woman is in town, and she’s not about to be counted out by anyone.  Even if she does groan when she rolls out of bed in the morning.  *-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*   Next in Series -- Pre-order now!  Fairy Crossed Bounty (Forty Proof Series Book 2) Demon Cursed Bounty (Forty Proof Series Book 3)  Can't wait for the next books in Breena's epic over forty romp? Then be sure to check out ALL the amazing, powerful PWF books available to you at:   www DOT paranormalwomensfiction DOT net  If you love my #PWF book, you'll be sure to love Jana DeLeon, KF Breene, Denise Grover Swank, Robyn Peterman, Christine Gael, Eve Langlais, Elizabeth Hunter, Kristen Painter, Mandy M Roth, Michelle M Pillow, Darynda Jones and Deanna Chase!
author: Shannon Mayer
